storyInfo: Iwona, who is in charge of luring the Armorless Union away, finds herself ambushed by Monique the Lazurite herself. The mysterious old knight has found Młynar; the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi is seemingly aware of the events that are about to unfold tonight—The Grand Knight Territory will soon descend into darkness.

attributes.content: The Infected are making their move.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: They'll really charge through the front door?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: They'd better. The bigger their ruckus, the less we leave the Board to use against us.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: How are things at the power plant?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Are you doubting me?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I wouldn't dare.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Can I kill Wild Mane?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Of course... now that things have come to this.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If we find ourselves some prey, that'll help make our owners less grumpy.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: They're prey who got away to begin with... I'm just taking back what should've been mine.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Contact Team 3. Have them pack it up and come with me.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Wild Mane spotted! Wild—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Too slow, Armorless!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Pulling dirty tricks in the shadows... Don't tell me you people have forgotten how to take on a knight!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Filthy Infected!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: This is for Jamie and all the innocent who died by your hands!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Eek—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: —Iwona! Don't forget what Sona said. Avoid killing anyone if you can... At the very least, when you kill them, make sure you're prepared to handle it.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Hey, you. Armorless... How many people have you killed?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Heh...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Trying to act all righteous now, are we? Hypocritical brat. Back when I was a bounty hunter on the Golden Prairie, I never gave a crap about that!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Have you forgotten what life outside the cities is like? Those who stand at the top, the strongest survivors, are all cold-blooded bastards! That's the way it goes!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: —Say whatever you want, but I've won.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: When you've lost, when you're dead, nothing you say matters.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: He probably sent out a distress signal just now...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hopefully that'll lure the Armorless Union here. That'll make Greynuty's job easier.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Fartooth, have you spotted any Armorless over there?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Greynuty's already in position. Just waiting on our signal.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: That said, the Armorless can't be this slow to react... Did Wild Mane really manage to lure them her way?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: She probably...
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Armorless spotted. They're heading your way from an alleyway on 4th Street, Iwona!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Iwona...? Can you hear me? Iwona?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Hey?! Szewczyk? Iwona?!
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The transmission... got cut? No way... In a city with this much transmission traffic...?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: This silence is creepy... Iwona. I have a bad feeling about this.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Are those Armorless guys really such pushovers that we can take them down with an ambush?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I'm not sure.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Bigger problem, I'm not getting any of Justyna's transmissions, and she should be staring down at us from somewhere up high right—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: (Shudder)—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: —Move!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: All of a sudden, Iwona is overwhelmed with an aura so suffocating that it threatens to make her puke.
She isn't sure this is really a biological response. It could be some kind of toxin or an Arts effect.
Then, a figure leaps down from the top of a tall tower.
The figure lands on the ground. The landing is silent as the veil lightly covering her.
You jumped from so high up, but you didn't even let out a peep, huh?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Must be nice to be a Feline.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Team 3...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: What?! When did they—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: (The difference between these guys and the ones we fought just now are night and day... She's wearing blue. Is she the Lazurite from the other day?)
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You go on ahead...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: But!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Go!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You'd better survive this!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Aargh?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: No way. I didn't even see her pull that bowstring—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Armorless Union operative in blue maintains her one-handed throwing posture.
A hint of dissatisfaction comes through her cold expression. After all, this hunt started on an unlucky note.
She... threw it?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Aghh! My leg. My leg!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Grit your teeth and keep running! Don't stop!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hey, stop looking around! I'm right here!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Are you Infected all idiots? Look how many bows we have aimed at you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Wild Mane Knight, you should be dead several days by now. Good on you, though. You still have the chance to play hero today.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Now run. I don't want this hunt to end on a such a boring note. Let's kill some time together.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Hah, you seem to be mistaken.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Do I look like the kind of gal who hides in the shadows?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You look like the kind who's getting herself killed.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: *Spit*. We Infected are sick of toiling our miserable lives away like that!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You're just a bunch of despicable bastards hiding behind the K.G.C.C., doing all kinds of shady business. Every one of us living out in the open is stronger than you!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Remember their faces!
Remember... These knights... These Kazimierzians... These cold-blooded murderers...
Don't let them get away with it!
Armorless scum...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Have you ever fought a gloompincer on the brink of death? Do you know how a dying, cornered animal fights?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: You're too full of yourself.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I may die, but that doesn't mean I'll lose. And you. You'll pay your dues right here.
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Then... My friends will...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Look at you. No fear of death on your face. You don't want to live, yet you still want to win. Ridiculous.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The blue Armorless Union operative takes out an arrow from behind.
Come.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You're going to use that arrow as a blade? What, you looking down on me?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You little...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Urgh—!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: So that's the speed you Kuranta are so proud of?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Don't underestimate me—
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Hraaagh––!!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Don't be such a crybaby. I made sure not to kill you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Now let me see how much blood you have to spill.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: After I've painted the entire street with it, the Infected hiding in the dark will probably stop resisting?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Um, Lazurite, she is Infected though...
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: If you're worried about catching it, you should look for a new job.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Once death calms her down, it'll be much easier to deal with the resisting Infected.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: It's been a while since I heard from Justyna...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Maybe she ran into some kind of trouble?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Either way, there's five minutes till our ambush.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sona should be in position by now. We just have to trust each other.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: It's almost time...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Everyone, be safe...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: You didn't even last a few minutes.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Go on... There should be seven or eight Infected hideouts around here, though I wouldn't be surprised if they're empty by now. Search all of them, one by one.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Get... back... here...
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'm not... done yet!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I'm leaving her to you. Not worth any more of my time.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: All units, prepare to fire—
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: Didn't I just say... I'm not done?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: —She still has the strength to fight?!
attributes.name: An Armorless Union Member

attributes.content: I don't want to kill too many people here...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The old and the young can go, but I'll take the heads of ten Infected knights back to keep my bosses happy.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You... You murderer!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: What did you do to Iwona?!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: She should probably have passed out from the blood loss by now, though it sounds like she might still be putting up a fight.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You monster—!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: You should know that even if you manage to get away now, it won't vindicate you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: I'll say it again. Ten Infected knights for the lives of everyone else.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: How can we trust you?! You're just a bunch of murderers, a bunch of sick bastards!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: I'll count Iwona... Just the lives of nine more knights.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Are you sure you can win?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Never mind, then... It'll be faster if I do it myself.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Now what's the rush?
If you want to keep your bosses happy, surely you'd want quality over quantity?
Wouldn't you agree?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Toland Cash.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Not to toot my own horn, but I'm sure I'm worth a hefty sum on the wanted posters?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: If you are willing to give me your own head, then I won't need any more.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Don't taunt her, Toland! She's—
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: 'Lazurite' Monique of the Armorless Union, am I correct?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I said it before... I don't like to be interrupted when I'm working.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: If you don't plan on giving yourself up, that makes three times you've interrupted me, Toland Cash.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The injured Infected knight isn't able to see everything clearly.
By the time his eardrums react, there's a sharp clashing sound.
Phew~ You really are quick on the draw with that bowstring.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You saw it...? No, your stance... That's the swordhand of a knight.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Since when do bounty hunters have tricks like that?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Oh, don't say that. If all we knew was shooting arrows, setting up traps, pulling dirty tricks, and waiting for our prey...
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Would we really be any different from the scum in the Armorless Union?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You won't dodge many more of my shots.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Whew, that was close.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Might want to watch your step, though.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Nngh—
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: An explosive trap...? You're still a bounty hunter in the end...
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Needless to say.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: —A charge... You've received knight training?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: That's it. You're helping the Nearls... so you must have something tied up with them.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: This really piques my interest, but work is work. We can't waste too much time on you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Man, what a pain... There's just no catching a taxi during the Major, is there?
attributes.name: A Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Excuse me, which way is the Holiday Knight Souvenir Shop?
attributes.name: A Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, look at the time. Let's find a restaurant and get a bite to eat first.
attributes.name: A Tourist

attributes.content: Will you look at that?! Our Columbian newbie is about to overwhelm Wisteria Knight once again!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Impressive speed! Now just one more—Hold on, hold on! What's going on?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Unbelievable! A devastating accident at the very last moment! Did our newbie trip?! Come on, this is the Major! Get up!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Do you always leave work this late, Młynar?
To what do I owe the pleasure...?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If I had known in advance, Lady Russell, I would've received you more properly.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Don't worry yourself. I won't be taking up much of your time.
attributes.name: Russell

attributes.content: Tonight will be messy. There will be lots for us to take care of.
attributes.name: Russell

attributes.content: Młynar, is the sword-bearing wanderer back?
attributes.name: Russell

attributes.content: The wanderer traveled through corpse-laden battlefields and boundless wastelands, at last making it to the fortress lit ablaze by cannonfire. Is the wanderer not back yet?
attributes.name: Russell

attributes.content: —I still haven't heard anything from them, but we can't wait any longer.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: In five minutes, we'll begin our ambush and cut off the core power source. The core district, where the General Chamber of Commerce is, will lose all power.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Then, and only then, will Sona have a chance to break inside.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: A big show then, huh? I like it.
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Our Adeptus 'friends' should have withdrawn the security here, clearing a path for us.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We need to be quick. Get ready—
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: W-What's that?! Where was that explosion?
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: T-The power supply sector? Why?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ashlock! Why did you start the operation early?!
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: No, we haven't started the charge yet—
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: —We've been had. Get out of there!
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Now sleep, Kawalerielki, my beloved Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Good night.
attributes.name: Roy
